question: The 8th edition of Home Expo India 2019 has started in which of the following cities?
explanation: The 8th edition of Home Expo India 2019 began at India Expo Centre and Mart in Greater Noida on April 16. It covers sectors with maximum thrust and growth potential in home decor, furnishing, furniture, flooring and textiles. About 500 companies in permanent marts will be exhibiting their collection under these categories.  The 3-day exhibition has been organized by the Export Promotion Council for Handicrafts.
